程序包 org.giiwa.misc

类 Html

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.misc.Html

  • public final class Html
extends java.lang.Object
    The Html Class used to string to html, html to plain, or get images from the html string.
    作者:
    joe

      • find

        public java.util.List<org.jsoup.nodes.Element> find​(java.lang.String selector)
        已过时。 
        find the element by the selector
        参数:
        selector - 1, .id for id element
        e.g: find(".aaa")
        2, .class for class attribute
        e.g: find(".aaa")
        3, tagname for tag directly
        e.g: find("div")
        返回:
        the list of Elements

      • select

        public org.jsoup.select.Elements select​(java.lang.String selector)

      • find

        public static java.util.List<org.jsoup.nodes.Element> find​(org.jsoup.nodes.Element e,
                                                           java.lang.String selector)
        已过时。 
        find the elements in the node.
        参数:
        e - the element node
        selector - the selector string
        返回:
        the list of element or null if nothing found

      • find

        public static java.util.List<org.jsoup.nodes.Element> find​(java.util.List<org.jsoup.nodes.Element> list,
                                                           java.lang.String selector)
        已过时。 
        find the elements in the elements by the selector.
        参数:
        list - the original elements
        selector - the string of selector, .id, .class, tag
        返回:
        the list of element or null nothing found
